channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to Expect in the Next Pullback
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The S&P 500 just notched 59 straight days above its 20-day moving average—something we’ve only seen a few times since 1950. A short-te...

item.title: A Surprising Opportunity
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Earnings season is heating up, and I’m seeing something most investors are missing. Nearly 93% of the first 55 S&P 500 companies to re...

item.title: These Lies Will Cost You Money

item.title: The Hidden Pullback
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The Equal-Weight S&P 500 just gave back nearly all its monthly gains—while the Nasdaq looked fine on the surface, over 80% of S&P 500 ...

item.title: What Market Seasonality Tells Us
